Reviews.Title: It could be better.
Reviews.Author: Xatan
Reviews.Content: It is conveniently to buy the basic necessary items together, but it would be better to order the items separately from Amazon.Canon 75-300mm is not a good lens, and I wished I read those negative feedback of it on Amazon before I placed my order. Choose a package with the Cannon 55-250mm IS lens instead.The case is cheap, and it has no zip to completely seal it. I am worried to bring it to the beach with a lot of wind and sand.Haven't tried the external flash yet, but after reading the manual, it seems to be better to buy a Canon external flash to make the best use of the camera.The other items are fine.With the recent Amazon sale of buying a camera and one extra lens together, you can get t3i with the 55-250mm IS lens and other accessory stuff (without the external flash) with a similar price.It is not the seller to blame, but do your homework before placing the order

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Trevor A. Bingham
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with the intention to learn all the capabilities.  While I still haven't learn all of them, I have found that with the automatic settings, it is about as easy as a point-and-shoot but with significantly better quality pictures and I can still do all the manual adjustments when I learn more.  The HD video capability is also a big plus.  The particular kit came with everything I wanted and was a much better deal than other kits.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: canon t3i
Reviews.Content: it's the camera feels well in the hands ,but the accessories aren't made in a good material ,the flash is made in a very cheap plastic and my bags was broke 2 months later,the filters are ok,and the memory cards work well , accepted in raw.the 75-300 is a OK the but don't have stabilizer and  in big distance the stabilizer made the difference by the way is better than the kit lens.

Reviews.Title: I bought a Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: ABCBRATT123
Reviews.Content: The item I bought was a canon camera, I am still learning how to use this camera. The product is okay. I had a problem with their ways of shipping, if you ship UPS ground, chances are it will be mishandled. My box was a total mess when it was delivered. The box looked as if it was tossed around all over the truck. Not So Happy!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal

Reviews.Content: Received when and as promised. The packing was a little weak but everything seems in good shape.  The camera is fun and easy to use and the pictures are awesome.
